name: Damage Reduction (Ex)
description:
A bloodrager gains damage reduction. Subtract 1 from the damage the bloodrager takes each time he is dealt damage from a weapon or a natural attack.

The amount of damage reduced is determined by your bloodrager level:
Levels 7-9:       1
Levels 10-12:  2
Levels 13-15:   3
Levels 16-18:  4
Levels 19-20:  5
